Issue.summary: npm audit Prototype Pollution Vulnerability (handlebars package)
Issue.description: istanbul-reports > handlebars │ ├───────────────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ More info │ https://nodesecurity.io/advisories/755 Proposed fix : *npm install --save-dev nyc@14.1.1* SEMVER WARNING: Recommended action is a potentially breaking change >
